purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of the information needed to support template three dimensionsal shape.

inscope.li: part template three dimensional keepout shape;
items within the scope of Extended_elemental_geometric_shape_arm;
items within the scope of Non_feature_shape_element_arm;
items within the scope of Part_template_shape_with_parameters_arm;
items within the scope of Physical_layout_template_arm.

ae.refpath: {shape_representation <= [representation.id= 'nfsd'] [representation.name = '3d bound volume shape'] [representation.description = 'pt3dks'] [representation representation.context_of_items -> representation_context => geometric_representation_context geometric_representation_context.coordinate_space_dimension = 3] [representation <- property_definition_representation.used_representation property_definition_representation property_definition_representation.definition -> property_definition property_definition.definition -> characterized_definition characterized_definition = shape_definition shape_definition shape_definition = shape_aspect shape_aspect => part_template_definition]}

{shape_representation <= [representation.name = '3d bound volume shape'] [representation.description = 'pt3ds'] [representation representation.context_of_items -> representation_context => geometric_representation_context geometric_representation_context.coordinate_space_dimension = 3] [representation <- property_definition_representation.used_representation property_definition_representation property_definition_representation.definition -> property_definition property_definition.definition -> characterized_definition characterized_definition = shape_definition shape_definition shape_definition = shape_aspect shape_aspect => part_template_definition]}
